data.eml:eml: Pangio bhujia, a new, peculiar species of miniature subterranean eel loach lacking dorsal and pelvic fins from India (Teleostei: Cobitidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Anoop, V. K., Britz, Ralf, Arjun, C. P., Dahanukar, Neelesh, Raghavan, Rajeev (2019): Pangio bhujia, a new, peculiar species of miniature subterranean eel loach lacking dorsal and pelvic fins from India (Teleostei: Cobitidae). Zootaxa 4683 (1): 144-150, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4683.1.8
